issue.title: manhwaclan.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://manhwaclan.com/manga/sister-i-am-the-queen-in-this-life/chapter-54/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmanhwaclan.com%2Fmanga%2Fsister-i-am-the-queen-in-this-life%2Fchapter-54%2F) ### Comment > I installed Firefox and AdGuard extension, and it worked nearly perfect for the first 24 hours. It showed that it blocked over 1000 ads, but after 24 hours it stopped working. No ads, pop-ups, or banners blocked. Video ads also still pop-up and play. Username: `@KDKD` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/imnlaq8keo84cgkc440ko8sgwscc8g45v687qsh0ug.png?nc=1)
